text.author: Dave Schilling
text.title: Beyond The Mat Episode 421
text.summary: On the show Beyond the Mat, Dave and Alex discuss wrestling news in the week of WrestleMania, Raw and Smackdown, including being glad that their favorite wrestler the Undertaker has finally retired despite people's objections and 90s nostalgia, and Alex recounts drinking tequila on his birthday and discusses the new DLC for King of Fighters XIV, which includes Rock Howard.
